title: One Month After The Fall Of Kabul Thousands Still Wait For Escape
description: It has been exactly one month since Kabul fell and the Taliban took control of Afghanistan. With U.S. troops gone from the region and the collapse of the Afghan Armed forces, thousands have been fleeing the country for safety.
copyright: Copyright 2020-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: One Month After The Fall Of Kabul Thousands Still Wait For Escape
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: It's been one month since the fall of Kabul. The thousands of Afghans promised protection remain trapped under Taliban rule.
itunes:subtitle: It's been one month since the fall of Kabul. The thousands of Afghans promised protection remain trapped under Taliban rule.
